name: Day of the Dice
description:
A regular top-down shooter... but getting hit changes your weapon!

The night was cold and dark as snake eyes... And when the sun rose, everyone had DICE FOR HEADS!!! It was... the DAY OF THE DICE. (Blah blah plot, everyone's killing each other with guns and you're hopping down a massive tower.)

How deep down the tower can you go? (My current highscore is 12!)

WASD / Arrow keys - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse Button - Shoot/Do menu stuff
Escape - Pause
F11 / Ctrl + Enter - Fullscreen
AND THAT'S IT! Just move 'n' shoot!

Menu music & after-fight music:
